Comments_List: This course covers almost all topics in numerical computation. I have learned a lot from this course.
Improved my knowledge of numerical methods. Learned a few new methods and tricks to improve on how I code and use existing methods.
Numerical linear algebra, analysis on ODE initial value problem, numerical integral, numerical method for integrale equations
It would be better to have a textbook or some lecture notes for reference.
The professor doesnt have a schedule and his accent is terrible. Also he never replies emails and never update materials on Canvas
This course is great if you already know some basics of numerical computation. Rokhlin covered common methods and how and when to use them effectively in great detail.
This is a very good course, I will highly recommend this course to students who need numerical calculation methods in their research.
This is a great course for anyone who does scientific computing. Everything in the course is necessary for day-to-day tasks such as solving differential equations.
Recommended for someone who has basic understanding of formal numerical analysis and differential equations.
